content.text: Download the current build (0-1)  of Worldmaker now! It's available now to download from the Engine page.

Download the predecessor version of Worldmaker now! "Worlds-Old" is a pretty basic world generator with layers that can be toggled and a handful of settings. It's available now to download from the Engine page.

Worlds-Old isn't compatible with the Worldmaker save system, so settings will be saved locally across any project created with the this predecessor version. To run it, simply create a project like you would for any other engine and open it with the Worlds-Old engine.
